info.title: Mezzanine API
info.description: A REST Web API for the Mezzanine content management system with the Cartridge e-commerce extension.

slug.title: URL
slug.description: Leave blank to have the URL auto-generated from the title.

slug.title: URL
slug.description: Leave blank to have the URL auto-generated from the title.

_meta_title.title: Title
_meta_title.description: Optional title to be used in the HTML title tag. If left blank, the main title field will be used.

gen_description.title: Generate description
gen_description.description: If checked, the description will be automatically generated from content. Uncheck if you want to manually set a custom description.

status.title: Status
status.description: With Draft chosen, will only be shown for admin users on the site.

publish_date.title: Published from
publish_date.description: With Published chosen, won't be shown until this time

expiry_date.title: Expires on
expiry_date.description: With Published chosen, won't be shown after this time

same_billing_shipping.title: My delivery details are the same as my billing details

remember.title: Remember my address for next time

card_ccv.title: CCV
card_ccv.description: A security code, usually the last 3 digits found on the back of your card.

combined.title: Combined
combined.description: If checked, products must match all specified filters, otherwise products can match any specified filter.

uses_remaining.title: Uses remaining
uses_remaining.description: If you wish to limit the number of times a code may be used, set this value. It will be decremented upon each use.

old_path.title: Redirect from
old_path.description: This should be an absolute path, excluding the domain name. Example: '/events/search/'.

new_path.title: Redirect to
new_path.description: This can be either an absolute path (as above) or a full URL starting with 'http://'.

is_public.title: Is public
is_public.description: Uncheck this box to make the comment effectively disappear from the site.

is_removed.title: Is removed
is_removed.description: Check this box if the comment is inappropriate. A "This comment has been removed" message will be displayed instead.

is_superuser.title: Superuser status
is_superuser.description: Designates that this user has all permissions without explicitly assigning them.

username.title: Username
username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.

is_staff.title: Staff status
is_staff.description: Designates whether the user can log into this admin site.

is_active.title: Active
is_active.description: Designates whether this user should be treated as active. Unselect this instead of deleting accounts.
